detaileddescription.para: Define the starting viewpoint for a given player.
Enable display of terrain in minimap.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int tileIndex, const Vec2i &pos, int value)
memberdef.name: SetTile

detaileddescription.para: Define the type of each player available for the map
Load the lua file which will define the tile models
Build tileset tables like humanWallTable or mixedLookupTable
Called after DefineTileset and only for tilesets that have wall, trees and rocks. This function will be deleted when removing support of walls and alike in the tileset.
Set the flags like "water" for a tile of a tileset
Get the name of the terrain of the tile.

simplesect.para: The name of the terrain of the tile.

detaileddescription.para: Check if the tile's terrain has a particular flag.

simplesect.para: True if has the flag, false if not.
